rules_text:
When this creature enters, create an implant token with a first strike counter. [i](It’s a token artifact with “{1}, {T}, Sacrifice this artifact: Put its counters on target creature. Activate only as a sorcery”)[/i]
This creature can’t block.
{1}{R}: This creature gets +1/+0 until end of turn.
